plugin.name: TrackStat
plugin.title: TrackStat *Beta*
plugin.desc: *** BETA VERSION ***. Store statistics such as rating, last played time and play counts so it survives a rescan and allows to to browse your library based on the statistic information. You can set the ratings via the Squeezebox player, CLI, Squeezebox Controller or web interface, ratings and statistic data can also be imported/exported from/to iTunes, Amarok and MusicIP Mixer. It also supports Dynamic Playlist plugin by adding dynamic playlists for all its statistics. Please note that TrackStat needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware.
plugin.changes: - THIS IS A BETA VERSION - Optimized startup sequence with SQLite - Corrected Dynamic Playlist integration so they can be launched from TrackStat pages - Corrected database indices
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DynamicPlayList
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist *Beta*
plugin.desc: *** BETA VERSION ***. Make it easy to create dynamic playlists for your own plugin. You simply need to implement two methods in your own plugin which returns the playlists and the next tracks. Currently at least supported by SQL Playlist plugin, TrackStat plugin, SugarCube plugin, iTunes Party Shuffle plugins and builtin support for saved static playlists
plugin.changes: - THIS IS A BETA VERSION - Added support for SQLite version of Squeezebox Server 7.4
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: SQLPlayList
plugin.title: SQL Playlist *Beta*
plugin.desc: *** BETA VERSION ***. Creates smart playlists based on SQL queries, its possible to create playlists similar to iTunes smart playlists if used together with ratings set with the TrackStat plugin. It requires Dynamic Playlist plugin
plugin.changes: - THIS IS A BETA VERSION - Added support for SQLite version of Squeezebox Server 7.4
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomScan
plugin.title: Custom Scan *Beta*
plugin.desc: *** BETA VERSION ***. Make it easier to develop modules that retreive additional information about artist, album, tracks from somehere. If used together with Custom Browse plugin, the included scanning modules for LastFM and custom tags makes it possible to browse music by LastFM tags or by a custom tag.
plugin.changes: - Added support for SQLite version of Squeezebox Server 7.4
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomBrowse
plugin.title: Custom Browse *Beta*
plugin.desc: *** BETA VERSION ***. Makes it possible to customize the structure, contents and sorting of the browse menus on the Squeezebox. A new browse menu is configured as a xml file containing the structure and SQL-statements. Please note that Custom Browse needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware.
plugin.changes: - Added support for SQLite version of Squeezebox Server 7.4
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson
